name: Wot Elementor Widgets
author: WebOccult Technologies Pvt Ltd

sections.description:
Attention Elementor users! Wot Elementor Widgets is a minimal and easy to Elementor widget collection that helps developers in implementing different web features like Tabbing with multiple customization options without any hassles.

Features

TabFlex

TabFlex is a multi purpose tabbing plugin for Elementor that provides many customization features when developer needs to implement a tabbing section in your website.

  • Enhance your website with dynamic tabbed content
  • Horizontal tabs design
  • Vertical tabs design
  • Easy manageble
  • It will not affect your other elementor’s widgets and plugin

Usage

After installing Wot Elementor Widgets, you can access the additional widgets and tools directly within the Elementor interface. Simply drag and drop them onto your canvas to incorporate them into your designs.

License

This plugin is released under the GPLv2 or later. See the LICENSE file included with the plugin for more details.

Thank you for using Wot Elementor Widgets for Elementor! We hope it enhances your Elementor experience and helps you create amazing websites.

Done!
sections.installation:
1. Download the Archive:

  • Obtain the plugin archive from the source.

2. Upload Method 1 (WordPress Dashboard):

  • Navigate to Plugins > Add New > Upload page.
  • Upload the zip file.

… OR …

3. Upload Method 2 (FTP):

  • Unpack the archive.
  • Upload the unpacked folder using your favorite FTP client to the /plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.

4. Activation:

  • Once the installation is complete, activate the plugin.

short_description: Wot Elementor Widgets presents TabFlex: A dynamic tab solution for Elementor with versatile design options and easy integration.
